# maglit/CMakeLists.txt
# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE

add_library(maglit STATIC maglit.cpp)

# Include fusion_io headers
target_include_directories(maglit PUBLIC ${FIO_DIR}/include ${HDF5_DIR}/include)

# Link fusion_io library
target_link_libraries(maglit PRIVATE ${FIO_DIR}/lib/libfusionio.so ${HDF5_DIR}/lib/libhdf5.so)
